      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d0158d-69a4-4222-241b-e53a6ccbf747#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Szent Ferenc stigmáinak felfedezése</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: The discovering of  Saint Francis's stigmas </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Das Entdecken Heiliger Franciss der
Schanden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Découvrir des stigmates de Saint
Francis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Descobrir dos stigmas de Saint 
Francis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: La scoperta degli stigmas del San 
Francis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Η ανακάλυψη των στιγμάτων Αγίου 
Francis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: El descubrir de los estigmas de 
Santo Francis</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Szent Ferenc stigmáinak felfedezése, 1325 k. Firenze, Santa Croce, Bardi-kápolna, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: The discovering of Saint Francis's stigmas, about 1325 Firenze, Santa Croce, Chapel Bardi, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Firenze,  Santa Croce,  Bardi-kápolna,  Szent Ferenc,  stigmák,  14. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Firenze,  Santa Croce, Chapel Bardi,  Szent Francis,  stigmas,  14th century,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Das Entdecken Heiliger Franciss der
Schanden, ungefähr 1325 Firenze, Sankt Croce, Kapelle 
Bardi, Fresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Découvrir des stigmates de Saint
Francis, environ 1325 Firenze, Santa Croce, chapelle Bardi, fresque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Descobrir dos stigmas de Saint 
Francis, aproximadamente 1325 Firenze, Santa Croce, chapel Bardi, 
fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: La scoperta degli stigmas del San 
Francis, circa 1325 Firenze, Santa Croce, chapel Bardi, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Η ανακάλυψη των στιγμάτων Αγίου 
Francis, περίπου 1325 Φλωρεντία, Santa Croce, παρεκκλησι
Bardi, νωπογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: El descubrir de los estigmas de 
Santo Francis, cerca de 1325 Firenze, Santa Croce, capilla Bardi, 
fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Firenze, Sankt Croce, Kapelle Bardi, Szent Francis, 
Schanden, 14. Jahrhundert,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Firenze, Santa Croce, chapelle Bardi, Szent Francis, 
stigmates, 14ème siècle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Firenze, Santa Croce, chapel Bardi, Szent Francis, stigmas, 1ô 
século,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Firenze, Santa Croce, chapel Bardi, Szent Francis, stigmas, 
quattordicesimo secolo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φλωρεντία, Santa Croce, παρεκκλησι Bardi, Szent 
Francis, στίγματα, 14$ος αιώνας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Firenze, Santa Croce, capilla Bardi, Szent Francis, estigmas, 
14to siglo,</string>
          </keyword>
